mod.description: In vanilla, monster kills on the farm do not grant XP or count towards quests. This mod changes that.
GainExp.title: Gain EXP
GainExp.description: Restore EXP gain from monster kills on farm.
QuestCompletion.title: Billboard Quest Completion
QuestCompletion.description: Count monster kills on the farm towards billboard quest completion?
SpecialOrderCompletion.title: Special Order Completion
SpecialOrderCompletion.description: Count monster kills on the farm towards special order objectives?
